QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_SiteBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of site.

QtoDef.Name: GrossPerimeter
QtoDef.Definition: Gross perimeter at the outer contour of the object.

QtoDef.Name: GrossArea
QtoDef.Definition: Gross Area of the object. Openings, recesses, projections and cut-outs are not taken into account.
